name: Arcana
description: Domain of innate, instinctual magic—volatile yet potent when channeled.

name: Blade
description: Domain of martial mastery and lethal steel, wielded to command life and death.

name: Bone
description: Domain of tactics and the body—predict foes and hone physical perfection.

name: Codex
description: Domain of rigorous magical study and written equations of power.

name: Grace
description: Domain of charisma—bend perception through story, charm, and lies.

name: Midnight
description: Domain of shadows and secrecy—craft enigmas and control the dark.

name: Sage
description: Domain of the natural world—tap earth’s raw magic and primal ferocity.

name: Splendor
description: Domain of life—heal, spare, or end through radiant vitality.

name: Valor
description: Domain of protection—raise shield and strength to safeguard allies.
